attributes.comment:
I'm disappointed the government feels they need to raise rates. This greatly
impacts many families in the process of internaltion adoption. The cost of
adoption is already a burden on some families desperate to have children. It may
not seem like much but the increases being proposed could be the difference
between the ability to adopt a child or not. This impact American families with
dreams to have children and their pursuit of happiness. Is an increase really
necessary? I think not. People making this decision may think it is a small
increase but it has huge impacts on American families. I ask that this decision is
reconsidered and you take into account the impact it will have. It doesn't have to
be all about the all mighty dollar.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
